scripts.ins: pnpm i --save && concurrently -n "Libart,View" -c "#0000ff,#ffff00" "cd lib/ui && pnpm i --save" "cd view && pnpm i --save"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "Build,Libart,View,Storybook" -c "#00ff00,#0000ff,#ffff00,#ff69b4"  "tsx main.ts" "cd lib/ui && pnpm dev" "cd view && pnpm dev" "cd view && pnpm storybook"
